item.description: Hartford Heights Tall Club will help Foodshare and Country 92.5 with the annual ?Turkey Central? drive at the Big Y in Manchester. Our shift is from 6:00 to 8:00 PM and we will be receiving, sorting and packing donations outside the store in the parking lot ? so come dressed appropriately! For those who are interested, there?s a Chinese buffet in the same plaza and we can grab a bite to eat when we are done. Directions from Hartford: I-84 to Exit 63, left off the exit, Big Y is on the right
item.name: "Turkey Toss"
